places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Alchi Zimskhang
address: Hotel Alchi Zimskhang, Alchi Chhoskor, Alchi, 194107

reviews.text:
Every time I come to Alchi, I always stayed here. This is probably the best hotel in Alchi.
The hotel is close to Alchi Monastery. Very good location.
The owner and staff are good, helpful and attentive to every guest. The chef served congee during breakfast per our requested.
It is recommended to open the windows in the room slightly to allow ventilation. Otherwise, you will have altitude sickness.

Tried the restaurant after visiting Alchi Monastery. its just few minutes walk from there. We ordered paneer dishes, rice and roti, it was average. We also tried Leh special Apricot juice from here. It's highly recommended to this while you are in Leh. They have really cozy seating areas located outside.

We enjoyed the stay. Very close to the Alchi monastery. Very professional and polite staff. Food was excellent. Rooms are spacious and well-lit. This review is for the new wing. Will recommend this place.
Excellent stay...All staff members r super..they go out of their way to make our stay wonderful...Rooms r super clean...food is super... excellent location..

Best hospitality! Right from the owner to manager, staff, chef everyone takes personal care. The rooms are spacious with balcony overlooking the mountains. The best experience is the Apple Tree garden restaurant - delicious food & perfect ambience.
Away from the hustle of Leh, perfect place to stay for couple of nights. The Alchi monestry itself is a 2 min walk and amongst the best in Leh

The rooms are clean and spacious, the staff, co-operative and helpful. Mr Raghu needs a special mention for his smiling countenance and agreeable nature. Pricing is very reasonable but above all the location and views from the backside facing rooms are absolutely stunning!
Overall an awesome experience.

Situated in a very beautiful location with mesmerizing views from the hotel backyard.
Absolutely stunning views even from the rooms.
Service is good, rooms are clean and tidy, bathrooms are clean. We loved our stay here for a night after a long bike ride.. The food was also good.
The special mention is for the hotel rooms with stunning views and the backyard. Sipping hot tea in the cold weather and seeing the snow capped mountains hits you differently.
Absolutely recommended place to stay and enjoy.

Loved the stay. The location is prestine, quite & serene. The rooms are spacious & clean. The staffs are very friendly and helpful. Special mention for Mr. Raghu for servicing to our needs with a smiling face always.

Great room' with view excellent food great food great service provider by Mr. Raghu during the stay
Wi saty with our film unit so much thanks manager mr.raghu

veary comfortable stay in duke neat and clean beautiful location courteous staff manager mr. raghu isveary help full person overall veary good expperience
thnks to again mr. raghu

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Samdupling Alchi
address: Alchi Monestary, Jammu and Village, Alchi, 194106

reviews.text: Had a lovely experience at this hotel. The management were warm and welcoming and went out of their way to ensure we were comfortable. Lovely people!

Well maintained, good service's
Specially owner cooperative person
Thanks a lot for your well service
Nice hotel for the conditions with a very old monastery in town. Roof terrace with a beautiful view. Friendly and attentive operators.
Thank you very much for your help.

Calm, serene, idyllic place near the Indus. Perfect place to do short, easy treks in the summer. A bit on the smaller side, but clean and decent accommodation. Nice garden full of apricot and apple trees. Also sipping Chai in common sit-out with a view of the mountains is a nice way to unwind.
Clean, comfortable, excellent dinner and breakfast. Charming owner. Highly recommendable
Nice place near indus river...good hotel
Nice Resort

This B&B is of a good standard in Ladakh. Hot food, hot water, and short power outage at night.
But every B&B is covered with apples and the air is clear and makes people happy.

I will warmly recommend Moljoks. Good and varied food and great service in a beautiful new dining hall. The rooms have excellent facilities and at the same an authentic atmosphere in a well-restored heritage building. The views are beautiful and the location is close to the Saspol caves and Alchi.

A very scenic place with beautiful rooms ,perfect combination of tradistional Ladakhi structure with modern hospitality,perfect place for make your holidays or weekends relaxed and memoriable from hustle bustle of the city life , nearby to Saspol Caves , and Indus river, must visit place.

Moljoks Heritage House is a beautiful place to visit for those seeking a peaceful and authentic experience in a beautiful heritage setting.
The heritage house is beautifully designed and decorated in earthen hues creating a peaceful and relaxing atmosphere that allows visitors to unwind and enjoy their surroundings. With its friendly staff, delicious food, and with a breathtaking view, this establishment is a one of a kind heritage property in Ladakh!

Our group stopped here for lunch .Newly refurbished property with superb restaurant created in wood and glass with view down to the river.Above the river in an orchard /garden.Still a work in progress.
Food and service excellant.
Excellent property. Stunning view. Strongly recommended if service is not a criteria. Even baby had to sleep without food

places_with_reviews.name: Denmo Home stay, Saspol, Leh, UT Ladakh

reviews.text:
Very clean room
Very nice family and peaceful village saspol on natural highway nh1. Near to state bank of india ATM. Beautiful garden and parking available there. Delicious food
Friendly owner and staff..

Beautiful home stay in saspol vilage.
Beautiful garden. Home food 🍲
Nice mountain View and near sbi atm
Clean bathroom and clean room. Big paking available
Good view and beautiful rose garden
Beautiful garden 🏡 good food
Homely home environment!! The nature and it's beauty, blooms in full swing
Comfortable country guesthouse in a very quiet location. Buffet food was very good and Bozo the local dog was a blast.
Accommodation was good but the food was excellent, apple orchard was there too,eat as many as u can
Good rooms, view and wonderful hosts.
Loved it
good

places_with_reviews.name: Potala Hotel Alchi
address: Jammu and, 65FF+47P, Srinagar - Ladakh Rd, Alchi, 194402

reviews.text: Very affordable and comfortable place..for a night stay in Alchi village
Well I didn't stay here, but I did visit to have lunch and honestly it was a good experience.
Small place beautiful village
Nice restaurant, tasty food, friendly people

places_with_reviews.name: Heritage Home Alchi
address: Near the alchi monastery Gate ,Leh,UT Ladakh Leh, UT, ladakh, Alchi, 194106

reviews.text:
We stopped at this place while going to Alchi monestry. It's famous for apricot juice.

We had apricot juice and maggi. The juice was thick and tasty. You must try if visiting Alchi monestry.

The place was surrounded by apricot trees and was so beautiful.
One of the best hotel in ladakh. you can see the huge mountains from the hotel, the view is totally amazing. I recommended that, you should go once in a lifetime.
Very Nice place to stay and calm adem, enjoyed the apricot juice
Food is average, prices are too high. It's not recommended place.
